group_1.textCenter: (Little by little, the sharpness of their stares@seems to have softened...)
(I sense that the number of people eyeing me@curiously has also diminished...)

group_1.textRight: Thank you for your hard work, Himuro-senpai.

group_1.textLeft: (This is all thanks to Shirogane collaborating@with the Advocacy group...)
I am indebted to you in a way my gratitude can@never fully repay...
Nevertheless, repaying you will be challenging@until the situation settles.

group_1.textRight: Actually, it's not advisable for us to be chatting@like this, either.

group_1.textLeft: Indeed, if you don't maintain a reasonable distance@then your supporters won't be able to defend you.

group_1.textRight: More importantly, right now I'm reciprocating@the favor to you,
so there's no need for you to do anything,@Himuro-senpai.

group_1.textLeft: I feel like I'm receiving too much from you,@Shirogane...

group_1.textRight: Well then, if it puts your mind at ease, I'll eagerly@await what you have to offer in return.

group_1.narration: Some strangers from school suddenly@started chasing me,@insisting that I'm a Magical Girl,@& they won't let me go!
Idk where they got this information,@but these people are judging me@based on my ring...!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, she might be under persistent assault,@just like that time we were cornered.

group_1.textRight: I'll also contact allies who are in the vicinity@of the scene.
If possible, could you tell me the location?

group_1.textLeft: I hope there's time for that, but I'll check just@to be sure.
Looks like Kurusu was close, detected the magic@reaction nearby, and is now heading to the scene.

group_1.textRight: Looks like that ring really is the evidence of@someone being a Magical Girl, huh.

group_1.textLeft: Why are you chasing me...?@I didn't do anything!

group_1.textRight: I don't know how you're still playing the victim.
Who is it that joins forces with the Witches@every day and murders people?!
You're the one who killed my sister, aren't you?!

group_1.textLeft: No, I didn't! And I'm not a Witch by any means!

group_1.textCenter: How could we have wanted to spread the word@about Magical Girls in order to be saved,
only to have people resent us like this...?
(Miura-san, who was videotaped, isn’t the only@one holding blame for this.)
(Himuro-san and I, who let the Witch escape,@are also responsible for this situation...)
Somehow...we need to clear up this@misunderstanding...
